document_data.mainbody:
Velicia was an archer gloom stalker member of The Guild crime gang of Baldurs Gate and secretly an undercover Harper in the late 15 century DR.
Velicia was a high elven woman with a fair skin tone and straight red hair gathered in a tight ponytail. She wore a half plate dyed in green colors of the Guild.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Velicia was placed as an undercover spy to work under Farlin, who led a gang of Guild members in dealing with the Stone Lord and his men. The new kingpin secretly served the Absolute and was trying to remove the Guilds influence from across the Gate. Farlins group faced a band of the Stone Lords men led by the tiefling Cairos, under the Wyrms Crossing bridge in Rivington. However, the meeting devolved into a battle and his squads fate remained uncertain, whether they were killed by the gangsters or survived and returned safely to the Guilds safehouse.
